bibl.title: Robert Curzon and his Mummy Labels.
bibl.note: Six Greek mummy labels (first-third centuries?) acquired in the 1830s by Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche, and now in the British Museum. - Acquisition. - Reception. - 1. BM EA 66415, Reg. 1979, 1-8-44. Thebes. - 2. BM EA 66416, Reg. 1979, 1-8-45. Abydos? - 3. BM EA 66417, Reg. 1979, 1-8-46. Abydos? - 4. BM EA 66418, Reg. 1979, 1-8-47. Abydos? - 5. BM EA 66419, Reg. 1979, 1-8-48. Abydos? - 6. BM EA 66420, Reg. 1979, 1-8-49. Abydos? - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Brian Muhs, Robert Curzon and his Mummy Labels.

Six Greek mummy labels (first-third centuries?) acquired in the 1830s by Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche, and now in the British Museum. - Acquisition. - Reception. - 1. BM EA 66415, Reg. 1979, 1-8-44. Thebes. - 2. BM EA 66416, Reg. 1979, 1-8-45. Abydos? - 3. BM EA 66417, Reg. 1979, 1-8-46. Abydos? - 4. BM EA 66418, Reg. 1979, 1-8-47. Abydos? - 5. BM EA 66419, Reg. 1979, 1-8-48. Abydos? - 6. BM EA 66420, Reg. 1979, 1-8-49. Abydos? - Avec résumé en anglais.
